name: Pandzer
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Pandzer you can Enchant a
number of {earth} to this Pandzer up to the number
of Elestrals on an opponents' field. When this
Pandzer is destroyed in battle you can draw a
card for each Enchanting Spirit on it.
